## blockRendering.ConstantProvider.getCSS\_() method

Get any renderer specific CSS to inject when the renderer is initialized.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getCSS_(selector: string): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  selector | string | CSS selector to use. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array of CSS strings.
